Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Enjoy a very good and tasteful pizza, sometimes with a different and original format. Pizzas were very good, me and my family loved it. The personnel was very kind and polite. Prices are average for the area where the place is for a pizza. Totally recommended.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Great place for Italian food (especially pizza). Quite crowded and with zero respect for 1,5m rule if you care about it. We heard Italian language around so it means that it is also popular amongst natives.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Big pizza, but well cooked and tasty. Big glasses of Peroni to top it off. A 21YO cat sleeping next to me on the long couch. Service is fast and good. Could be a bit more cozy, but overall good!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Amazing Neapolitan pizza! Turnip tops and sausage, Margherita, 4 formaggi, and fried calzone... You can't go wrong! Very nice and friendly staff

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Best pizza in town! We tried Calzone, which we really liked. Aperol Spritz is üëåüèªVery friendly staff and manager! Dogs are allowed üòä

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Best veggie Neapolitan pizzas in Amsterdam. Mine and my girlfriends go to when fancying a Friday night pizza. Also great to sit in and eat with a good vibe and friendly staff.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Heaven on earth! Best pizza! The dough is crispy and fluffy. Tasty ingredients and freshly made.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The place is super well maintained, pizza is so good and the prices are super small, in comparison with other places in Amsterdam. The pizza dow is perfect like in a napoletan pizzeria, the service was good and the limoncello delicios. If i will recommend somethig will be the Mangia Pizza and the Dolci pizza with nutela. Delicious!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: A disappointing visit to a well rated pizza spot.  Service was poor and took a very long time for drinks. appetizers and pizza.  For the appetizers, the bruschetta was seemingly left over pizza dough with some cut tomatoes on top.  Ordered ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: These guys know how to make pizza. It is absolutely delicious. Besides this, the place is cozy and welcoming. Service was very good and the staff are friendly and nice.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text:
This place is probably the the beat at Pizza i have ever tried! I would say it beats most of the restaurants i have tried in Italy aswell!
Would recommend this place to anyone going to Amsterdam, and looking for a great ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: We ordered three different pizzas at 1:00 p.m. on Sunday afternoon. The pizzas were delivered at 2:23 p.m.!! (We are only a kilometer away) Of course, as we were starving, we called the restaurant several times but they just refused to ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: I enjoyed an amazing Diavola pizza at Mangua Pizza.  The crust was cooked to perfection with just the right amount of char and chewiness. The toppings were very well balanced for a spicy authentic flavor.   I highly recommend!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Excellent choice for that pizza craving. The place offers good sitting capacity and friendly service. Tasty pizza that reminds you of Italy. For more experiences like this follow @quiquinnv

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Pizza was great ! Very authentic Pizza, thin dough, crunchy edge, juicy topping fantastic mozarella ,delicious ! Very friendly staff !

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Delicious pizza. Good atmosphere. Also company by a cat was really unexpected. All in all, if you are not afraid of cat I can just recommend this restaurant!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Good pizza place! Small restaurant with tasty pizza and good wines. Staff is friendly. Usually busy place so better to have reservation in advance. Especially I recommend the pizza with nutella as desert at the end of the dinnerüòâ

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: As an Italian I try to avoid italians restaurant abroad, but this place is like a little slice of Italy in Amsterdam. The pizza is perfect, a real traditional pizza with fresh ingredients!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: We stumbled across this place after being turned away from another restaurant down the road. It was really busy but the staff were great and managed to accommodate us. The food was amazing- the ingredients were so fresh and tasty. The staff ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Real Neapolitan pizzas in this place. The pizza fritta is also fantastic

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Real Napolitano pizza By chef Antonio. Ingredients are certified italian products. Restaurant is pretty crowded so expect some delays in the service however the wood fired pizza is delicious. Recommend the truffle and quattro stagioni. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Very authentic Italian diahes, speciality is pizza ofcourse.. Didn't even had time to take pics!üòÖ

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: I truly forgot that I came to travel to Amsterdam. Real Italian restaurant, half of the crew and customers speak Italian. Great pizza. And great experience.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: My No.1 pizza in Amsterdam and the best pizza that i‚Äôve eaten outside of Italy!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: One of the best authentic Italian pizza take-away options available in Amsterdam. We were missing an item in our order but, they went above and beyond to ensure we received it quickly. The house pizza is really worth trying.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text:
Great pizza, one of the most tasty in Amsterdam. The dough is very light, you don't feel stuffed after eating the pizza.
Staff is very friendly. They also have the first woman pizza baker in the Netherlands.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Highly recommend. Best pizza I have ever had outside of Italy! I am quite particular  person but their menu had such unique flavours and combinations and at good prices.  We absolutely loved the truffle pizza and the one with the cured beef ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Pizza was cold and sloppy and lasagna was burnt. Tried to resolve this on the phone but  restaurant blamed it on Uber driver but the pizza must have been cold when it left the restaurant as I could follow his five minutes trip. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Excellent pizza, real Italian recipes and good oven. Staff very friendly. Keep it up guys!!!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Ordered pizza from here and 3 hours later was told the delivery guy ‚Äòstole‚Äô it & there‚Äôs nothing they could do ü§£ no idea if it would have been any good or not

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The pizza is nice, but not like in Italy. Service is fine. The branch at De Pijp is better.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Good food, great staff. Really the best pizza in Amsterdam. Go try for yourself üòÄ

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Good pizza, cozy restaurant. I didn't really like our waiter, he was setting the table like he was pissed at us for wanting to eat here, but it wasn't any deal breaker, because the food was very tasty.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Very nice and sympathetic co-worker ! We have overlooked an ingredient that we cannot eat unfortunately BUT they were so nice and kind and changed the pizza for us without paying twice! The pizza was very delicious and the ingredients were ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: For me it is my go to place when I'm searching for quality pizza in Amsterdam. Haven't found a crust in Amsterdam that is so fluffy and amazing. If you like thin crust pizza, this is not the spot to go. Very well priced and they listen to any changes you'd like to make to your pizza. Staff is helpful and quick. Highly recommend!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The card machine was not working and the pizza was mainly burnt. And I don't mean the slightly burnt crust due to baking in the wood-burnt oven. No. This is black. Look yourselves

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text:
A very nice italian place in Amsterdam!
Great music and very delicious pizzas.
Mangia pizza and Da Antonio tasted super good.
Family friendly.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Extremely good Neapolitan style pizza. One of the best in Amsterdam. Service also good

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Delicious fresh pizza, lovely atmosphere, and they have a cat!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: As they say, this truly is the best pizza in Amsterdam.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: This place has a lot of potential, but execution is poor. They have skilled and friendly staff, wood burning pizza oven, first class ingredients... However it's all ruined by experimentation. When I order pizza in western Europe, I have ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Great Italian pizza where it's actually made by Italian chef, very busy place orders take time longer than it should be  but it was worth the wait.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Mangia Pizza is the best I've had in Amsterdam. Excellent ingredients, great pizza dough, kind staff, reasonably priced. Thank you Mangia

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Take away pizzas were ready really fast and were delicious as well! Will definitely be back again soon!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Don't go there if you're vegan. Their vegan pizza is pretty sad, and overall it just tastes like tomato sauce with few random tasteless veggies on top. For 13‚Ç¨ they can do much better, since making a pizza like that costs them probably only 2‚Ç¨. Staff is friendly, but that's mainly it.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: We have been to this restaurant several times and it never dissappoints. The staff is incredibly friendly and accommodating even when they are extremely busy. The pizza reminds us so much of the pizza we had in Naples, Italy. It's like being on vacation to come have dinner here.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text:
Delicious and freshly made pizzas from the stone oven
We ordered their special which comes with the crust stuffed with mozzarella and ham,  topped with salami, fresh tomatoes, lots of mozzarella and rocket on top ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: We ended up in Mangia by chance, and it was really awesome experience. Great pizza from Napoli in the middle of Amsterdam with friendly service. We waited not more than 10minutes for our order. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: What‚Äôs great pie!   Very good service too.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: This is becoming one of my favourite Pizzeria in Amsterdam. The quality of the pizza is great, there's not a lot of choice, but that's how it works in Italy as well... Just few pizzas but GOOD ones (and no ppineapple around). ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: If you look for a real pizzeria, here you can find an authentic pizza Napoletana. The dough is top notch, with a superb crust and an delicious taste. Very friendly staff.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: My girlfriend and I dropped by Mangia Pizza on a Wednesday while we were visiting Amsterdam. We saw the 4.5 star rating on trip advisor so we went there to see if it held up to that rating. Upon arriving there were no guests but we went for ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The pizzeria has potential - the food itself was very good. BUT there were several problems that made our experience unpleasant. First of all, we had to wait about 45 minutes before even getting any water and service. The waitresses didn't ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Lovely welcoming atmosphere. Ordered the Bruschetta Funghi and Gorgonzola and Tartufella pizza. Both were pretty mediocre. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Amazing pizza! Sat inside with the family and enjoyed the food. Staff are very very friendly and pizza was so tasty and the portions were huge! We would visit again

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The food is really good and the grumpy old cat Bruno is so precious. If you're lucky, he will take a liking and sit next to your or on your lap. ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Original Italian taste and good service

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The pizzas are genuinely tasty and the service super friendly

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The pizza is huge and soo tasty üòã  Love this place

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: We tried the quattro formagio and margherita pizzas and really enjoyed both. The pizzas here are made in a wood fired oven and the ingredients are of high quality. They are quite large and made to order. That considered, prices are very reasonable.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Authentic Italian pizza. Compared to others places in the city here you can find a large selection of pizza as in any pizzeria in Italia, not just 5/10 flavors created to match locals taste.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Great traditional Napolitan pizza. The products used are fresh and recognizable from the Campania region of Italy such as the buffalo mozzarella and the san marzano tomatoes. The dough of the pizza is put together very well according to traditional napolitan ways. Soft and elastic with a thick edge. Perfect

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Ive been trying some many places in Amsterdam for pizza and that was the best pizza i have ever had(Almost same level as nNea but one tsik better)!!Great quality and price!well done!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text:
So delicious
The pizza is the best of Amsterdam !!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Pleasant staff, great selection, really tasty pizza üçï !!!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: One of the best pizzas in my entire life! Even better than many places in Italy actually! Make sure you try their special 'Mangia' pizza, I almost started crying so good it was

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Amazing pizza and panuozzo! Staff very friendly and young, it seems to be in Italian place. Very recommended

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Staff were very welcoming, the place had a nice relaxing atmosphere. I had a diavola pizza which was very nicely done, Neapolitan style. I followed this up with a tiramisu which was also nice. Will definitely recommend to anybody I know staying in this area of Amsterdam in the future.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Fabulous true Italian pizza with very friendly staff and decent prices. Love it

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Pizza was a really tasty and the service was great

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Best i ever tried

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Small quaint pizzeria with a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Best pizza in Amsterdam. Gets quite busy, so be sure to call ahead and reserve!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: This place has a lot of potential, but execution is poor. They have skilled and friendly staff, wood burning pizza oven, first class ingredients... However it's all ruined by experimentation. When I order pizza in western Europe, I have ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Highly recommend. Great quality pizza for a good price. Best in Amsterdam (and I‚Äôve tried a lot of places!)

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: If you look for a real pizzeria, here you can find an authentic pizza Napoletana. The dough is top notch, with a superb crust and an delicious taste. Very friendly staff.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The food is amazing but our waitress wasn't very welcoming which was quite unfortunate.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: We have been to this restaurant several times and it never dissappoints. The staff is incredibly friendly and accommodating even when they are extremely busy. The pizza reminds us so much of the pizza we had in Naples, Italy. It's like being on vacation to come have dinner here.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The place needs booking in advance, but it's well worthy. The restaurant is a tiny , cosy, very enjoyable place, and the food is terrific! The only let down we had was that none of the desserts on the menu was available to order. And it took quite some time to get what we ordered. Rather than that, perfect!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Small quaint pizzeria with a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Best pizza in Amsterdam. Gets quite busy, so be sure to call ahead and reserve!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The service was great here! Good pizza we shared one. They have generous portion size.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Went in on a hot day (36 degrees). 2 airconditioning units on the wall were switched on, but didnt work. Maybe just on for show but set on low to save energy. Asked the waitress to switch on properly, but she was just being very unfriendly. Left immediately, since it was hotter than a pizza oven and unbearable to stay

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The place needs booking in advance, but it's well worthy. The restaurant is a tiny , cosy, very enjoyable place, and the food is terrific! The only let down we had was that none of the desserts on the menu was available to order. And it took quite some time to get what we ordered. Rather than that, perfect!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Ordered on Deliveroo. Was very pleasantly surprised by how good the pizza was. A bit of condensation from being in the box (not uncommon for pizza delivery especially when it isn't "junkfood pizza") I would look forward to going to eat in the restaurant.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Small quaint pizzeria with a warm and welcoming atmosphere. Best pizza in Amsterdam. Gets quite busy, so be sure to call ahead and reserve!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text:
Great quality food, great service and atmosphere. I went there first with friends from work and came back with my family after 2 days.
The food is made as it should, with ingredients from specific areas in Italy.
Highly recommended for you, your friends and family.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Highly recommend. Great quality pizza for a good price. Best in Amsterdam (and I‚Äôve tried a lot of places!)

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: I‚Äôm not going to say much. JUST GO! The best pizza I‚Äôve ever had and I‚Äôve had quite some, including in several Italian cities. I had the special with ham, Gorgonzola and spicy salami. SIMPLY DELICIOUS!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text:
This place was a great surprise! Excellent pizza, good selection of ingredients, friendly staff, and good prices for Amsterdam standards :)
Can't wait to go back and try u'panuozzo.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Haven‚Äôt taste better pizza than that in Amsterdam! Crunchy crust with rich flavors of great ingredients. Nice waiter and great cozy restaurant.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text:
One of the BEST authentic Italian pizzas in Amsterdam!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: I might be in the minority but in my opinion the food served was strictly ok. The mangia vegetarian pizza was more like eating dough with cheese filling and tiramisu left a lot to be desired. Doubt if we'll be going back!

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Located close to the end of the Vondelpark, it has nice pizzas and good prices. Quite full and noisy, with Italian vibes and special variety of Italian beers. For 2 or big groups.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Great pizza! The  crust is fantastic in my opinion. Nice and soft, yet with a bite. And the staff is super friendly.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text:
It's my best "pizza dealer" in Amsterdam!
If you are Italian and you badly need your weekly dose of Good Pizza, you have to go at Mangia Pizza! ‚Ä¶

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The service was great here! Good pizza we shared one. They have generous portion size.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: I saw small insect walking in my to go pizza box. Ok. Can happen. Sometimes you‚Äôre hungry, so you got to eat. Than i found 4/5 slices of salami and a hair on my pizza salami. Come on guys, is this love for food or what is going on?

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: The food is amazing but our waitress wasn't very welcoming which was quite unfortunate.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Not my kind of pizza. Neapolitan style. Borders are too thick and high, dough uncooked. The waitress was not really professional.

Name: Mangia Pizza

Did not give it a one star because think it was because the waitress that was servicing us was new she kept asking other staff for help.

Name: Mangia Pizza

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Delicious pizzas with amazing dough!!!! Truffle one really recommended!!!

Name: Mangia Pizza

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Amazing pizza, the dough was so moist and baked to perfection. Best pizza I've had in Amsterdam.

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Great spot. Regret not coming here sooner. Always went to a pizza spot a couple doors down but Mangia is definitely better. Better quality, better price and a real Italian experience :)

Name: Mangia Pizza
Review Text: Really good pizza. But the delivery service from Thuisbezorgd is not prompt at all which makes the pizza not tasty anymore as complained by most other customers I learned from the restaurant owner. Thanks for the restaurant owner's ‚Ä¶
